Welcome to the last but not least piece of my portfolio!

```{r lib}
library(shiny)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r quiz}
fluidPage(
  sliderInput("q1", "1. I set clear rules but also listen to my child's opinion:", 1, 5, 3),
  sliderInput("q2", "2. I expect obedience without questioning:", 1, 5, 3),
  sliderInput("q3", "3. I rarely enforce rules consistently:", 1, 5, 3),
  sliderInput("q4", "4. I explain the reasons behind rules:", 1, 5, 3),
  sliderInput("q5", "5. I believe in strict discipline:", 1, 5, 3),
  sliderInput("q6", "6. I try to avoid conflict, even if it means bending the rules:", 1, 5, 3),
  
  h3("Your Parenting Style:"),
  verbatimTextOutput("result")
  
)

```

```{r server, echo=FALSE}
output$result <- renderText({
  # Get responses
  q1 <- input$q1
  q2 <- input$q2
  q3 <- input$q3
  q4 <- input$q4
  q5 <- input$q5
  q6 <- input$q6
  
  # Score categories
  authoritative <- q1 + q4
  authoritarian <- q2 + q5
  permissive <- q3 + q6
  
  scores <- c(Authoritative = authoritative,
              Authoritarian = authoritarian,
              Permissive = permissive)
  
  style <- names(which.max(scores))
  
  paste("You are a", style, "parent.")
})
```
